</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 75</row>

</row>

---

This puppet is carved out of ebony wood and affixed to violet strings for easy manipulation.
